slides.title: Consultation
slides.text: After the initial enquiry for any new project, we will email a questionnaire so that we can obtain an understanding of the overall brief.

slides.title: Design Development
slides.text: In the second stage you should expect to have one or two meetings with the designer.We will present the initial concept including floor plans and furniture layouts.

slides.title: Document Preparation
slides.text: Your quotation will be prepared and, at this stage, you may be introduced to our trades team as they carry out site surveys.

slides.title: Design Development
slides.text: At this next stage, we will introduce you to our Project Co-ordinator and Project Manager who will ensure your project is delivered according to plan.
